MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bethesda affecting properties in Ystad Coetmor, Coetmor Road, Erwlas Estate and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:59am. Our engineers have arrived on site  and confirmed the power cut has been caused by broken equipment on the overhead network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:51am on 12th February 2021.
